title: Are there dividend stocks available in GStocks PH?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

- [How can I update my account information in my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31218818513305-How-can-I-update-my-account-information-in-my-GStocks-PH-account)
- [Are there dividend stocks available in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31218842595353-Are-there-dividend-stocks-available-in-GStocks-PH)

- [Can I transfer stockholdings to another Philippine stock brokerage firm in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31225286057369-Can-I-transfer-stockholdings-to-another-Philippine-stock-brokerage-firm-in-GStocks-PH)
- [How can I close my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31259171664537-How-can-I-close-my-GStocks-PH-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Your cash dividends earned in GStocks PH will automatically go to your trading wallet as required under the existing rules of the Philippine Stock Exchange.

Here are some of the stocks listed on GStocks PH that offer dividends:

1. **Globe Telecom (GLO)**
2. **Ayala Land (ALI)**
3. **Jollibee Foods Corporation (JFC)**
4. **Universal Robina Corporation (URC)**
5. **Bank of the Philippine Islands (BPI)**
6. **SM Prime Holdings (SMPH)**
7. **Puregold Price Club (PGOLD)**

These companies are among the 280+ listed on the PSE that you can invest in through GStocks PH.

### **How Dividends Work on GStocks PH**

**Automatic Credit**

Dividends earned from these stocks will automatically be credited to your GStocks PH Wallet as per the existing rules of the PSE.

**Withdrawal**

If you wish to withdraw your cash dividends, you can do so from your GStocks PH dashboard by selecting Withdraw. You will receive your dividends in your GCash Wallet from your GStocks PH Wallet.

Once you earn dividends, you will receive an email in your GStocks PH registered email.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [What are the GStocks PH buy and sell fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17542731035289)

- [How do I check the status of my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211043753497)
